name: varanasi-swm
description: Solid waste management in smart city contexts involves waste collecting containers (bins) and waste collecting vehicles. Bins are fitted with sensors to monitor the realtime volume (or level) of waste contained within it and the details of the last collected time and vehicle which serviced it. Vehicles are fitted with GPS sensors that report the latest location along with the license_plate (identifier) of that particular vehicle. This sandbox shows analytics such as - 1. Distrubtion of bins across the city 2. Regions in which the vehicles ply 3. Derived schedules and routes of vehicles and temporal trends 4. Bins which are not serviced by any vehicles.
label: Varanasi Solid Waste Management
